appName: Elven Arrows – Mixed Reality Bow & Arrow
displayName: Elven Arrows – Mixed Reality Bow & Arrow
display_name: Elven Arrows – Mixed Reality Bow & Arrow
display_long_description:
# 2-Player co-op: Turn Your Home into an Elven Watchtower and Defend the Realm! 🏹✨

Greetings, archer, and welcome to Elven Arrows, an auto-adaptive and immersive Mixed Reality game that transforms your entire room into a free-roam VR watchtower. Defend the realm behind your walls, walk freely around your space, and use your transformed home as the vantage point from which you protect ancient crystals. Armed with a bow and arrow (plus mystical upgrades!), you must guard the sacred crystals from invaders determined to shatter your defenses. Your real-world space seamlessly transitions into a magical battleground, where every wall and object becomes part of this immersive adventure!

### 

## **🔮 TRANSFORM YOUR SURROUNDINGS INTO A PLAYSPACE**

Scan your environment in the blink of an eye and watch as your surroundings morph into a watchtower. Your physical room, encircled by the stone walls of an enchanted tower, marks the boundaries of your game world—complete with virtualized furniture.

###

## **Why "Elven Arrows" Will Enchant You**
- **🏠 Auto-Adaptive Mixed Reality:** Watch as your living space morphs into a lofty tower overlooking the realm.
- **🏹 Become an Elite Elven Archer:** Hone your skills and unlock magical powers to fend off waves.
- **👥 2-Player co-op Fun:** Team up with 1 friend in the same room.
- **🚶 Immersive Free-Roam:** Move freely around your “tower,” taking full advantage of your space to find the perfect shot.

###

## **Other 2Sync Games:**

- House Defender 🛡️
- Mixed Snow Worlds ❄️
- The Last Galaxy 🚀
